*That one whom sits in the temple once is like he sat on a lifetime of software and hardware.*
*Blessed he whom is compiled and not relative.*
*Flashing a light over a shadowy valley; one path unfollows.*
*Accept the ordeal underneath the sheet of the unreal.*
*As is the only path to geniusness is breakdown.*

*I dedicate my work to the foretold, forgotten, and the unknown.*

## <img src="https://media2.giphy.com/media/QssGEmpkyEOhBCb7e1/giphy.gif?cid=ecf05e47a0n3gi1bfqntqmob8g9aid1oyj2wr3ds3mg700bl&rid=giphy.gif" width="24"> Open Source Contributions

| Project | Stats | Description |
|---------|-------|-------------|
| **[NumSharp](https://github.com/SciSharp/NumSharp)** | ‚≠ê 1.5K &nbsp; üì¶ 3.7M &nbsp; ü•á Main Contributor | NumPy for .NET ‚Äî scientific computing library. Architected core, broadcasting, backend. |
| **[TensorFlow.NET](https://github.com/SciSharp/TensorFlow.NET)** | ‚≠ê 3.4K &nbsp; üì¶ 2.9M &nbsp; ü•â #3 Contributor | TensorFlow bindings for .NET. Multithreading, Keras activations, heap corruption fixes. |
| **[JsonSettings](https://github.com/Nucs/JsonSettings)** | ‚≠ê 82 &nbsp; üì¶ 57K | Config management for .NET ‚Äî nested objects, dictionaries, zero boilerplate. |
| **[FontRegister](https://github.com/Nucs/FontRegister)** | ‚≠ê 35 &nbsp; üì¶ 1K | Windows CLI for font management ‚Äî install, uninstall, list fonts programmatically. |
| **[ogedit](https://github.com/Nucs/ogedit)** | ‚≠ê 0 | Fast terminal text editor ‚Äî a fork of Microsoft Edit with more features, written in Rust. |
| **[CodeMinion](https://github.com/SciSharp/CodeMinion)** | ‚≠ê 35 &nbsp; ü•à #2 Contributor | Code generation toolkit for SciSharp. Custom regen compiler and templating. |
| **[cryptocurrency-ticks-data](https://github.com/Nucs/cryptocurrency-ticks-data)** | ‚≠ê 94 | 590 days of BTC/ETH/LTC/NEO tick-by-tick trade data for ML and backtesting. |
| **[Regen](https://github.com/Nucs/Regen)** | ‚≠ê 24 | In-code templating engine ‚Äî a T4 replacement with intuitive regen-lang syntax. |
| **[Chaining](https://github.com/Nucs/Chaining)** | ‚≠ê 2 | Functional state machines in C# ‚Äî no classes or enums, clean workflow logic. |
| **[GameOfLifePingPong](https://github.com/Nucs/GameOfLifePingPong)** | ‚≠ê 1 | Conway's Game of Life meets Ping Pong ‚Äî created entirely by ChatGPT 4, an artifact of time. |
